title: Ticket #1856: Add command-line flag to condor_submit_dag to run DAGMan directly
description: Add a command-line flag (maybe -run or -direct) to condor_submit_dag that causes it to directly fork condor_dagman instead of submitting it as a Condor job. (This is really just intended for debugging -- the reason is that, while you can run condor_dagman directly from the command line, it's kind of a pain to get all of the command-line arguments set up correctly.
